activities.name: L_LOGTBL
activities.description:
drop table [dbo].[ETLLog]

create table [dbo].[ETLLog]
(

TableName varchar(255),
WatermarkValue datetime,
Status varchar(32)
);

INSERT INTO [dbo].[ETLLog]
VALUES ('data_source_table','1/1/2010 12:00:00 AM','Success')

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ETLLog]

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(WatermarkValue) as Logtime from [dbo].[ETLLog] WHERE Status='Success';

activities.name: IncrementalCopyActivity
activities.description:
drop table [dbo].[data_source_table];

create table [dbo].[data_source_table]
(
    PersonID int,
    Name varchar(255),
    LastModifytime datetime
);

INSERT INTO [dbo].[data_source_table]
    (PersonID, Name, LastModifytime)
VALUES
    (1, 'aaaa','9/1/2021 12:56:00 AM'),
    (2, 'bbbb','9/2/2018 5:23:00 AM'),
    (3, 'cccc','9/3/2021 2:36:00 AM'),
    (4, 'dddd','9/4/2020 3:21:00 AM'),
    (5, 'eeee','9/5/2022 8:06:00 AM');

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[data_source_table]

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
FROM [dbo].[data_source_table]
WHERE LastModifytime > '@{activity('L_LOGTBL').output.firstRow.Logtime}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('L_M_TBL').output.firstRow.L_S_time}'

activities.name: Stored procedure1
activities.description:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_ETLLog]( @TableName varchar(50), @WatermarkValue datetime, @Status varchar(32) )
AS
BEGIN
INSERT INTO [dbo].[ETLLog]( TableName, WatermarkValue, Status)
SELECT @TableName, @WatermarkValue, @Status
END

activities.name: L_M_TBL
activities.description:
drop table [dbo].[data_source_table];

create table [dbo].[data_source_table]
(
    PersonID int,
    Name varchar(255),
    LastModifytime datetime
);

INSERT INTO [dbo].[data_source_table]
    (PersonID, Name, LastModifytime)
VALUES
    (1, 'aaaa','9/1/2021 12:56:00 AM'),
    (2, 'bbbb','9/2/2018 5:23:00 AM'),
    (3, 'cccc','9/3/2021 2:36:00 AM'),
    (4, 'dddd','9/4/2020 3:21:00 AM'),
    (5, 'eeee','9/5/2022 8:06:00 AM');

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[data_source_table]
